sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AutoResolutionMLSolutionChoiceListBuilder</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AutoResolutionMLSolutionChoiceListBuilder</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AutoResolutionMLSolutionChoiceListBuilder = Class.create();
AutoResolutionMLSolutionChoiceListBuilder.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	getStateChoiceList: function() {	
		var language = AutoResolutionUtil.getSessionLanguage();
		var list = new GlideChoiceList();			
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");				
		gr.addEncodedQuery("element=state^name=ml_solution^language=" + language);				
		gr.query();				
		while (gr.next()) 			
			list.add(new GlideChoice(gr.value, gr.label));				

		return list;		
	},

    type: 'AutoResolutionMLSolutionChoiceListBuilder'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-08-25 21:52:19</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2cfd682a73321010f14a063f34f6a723</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AutoResolutionMLSolutionChoiceListBuilder</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Issue Auto-Resolution" source="com.glide.cs.auto_resolution">85493a472f800110d8a4d5f62799b6a9</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2cfd682a73321010f14a063f34f6a723</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-03-22 22:27:58</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>592</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
